useCase.name: Perform Dataset Operation
useCase.description: As an AppDeveloper, I want to perform various operations on a Dataset Instance using different interfaces.

preconditions.precondition: The user has access to the CLI Tool, REST API, and UI Application.

successEndConditions.condition: The operation on the Dataset Instance is successfully completed.

useCase.trigger: User initiates an operation through the CLI Tool, REST API, or UI Application.

mainSequence.step: AppDeveloper initiates an operation through the CLI Tool.
CLI Tool requests the operation on the Dataset Instance from the Dataset Management System.
Dataset Management System executes the operation on the Dataset Instance.
The Dataset Instance operation is successful.
Dataset Management System confirms the success to the CLI Tool.
CLI Tool displays a success message to the AppDeveloper.
UI Application fetches Dataset Instances from the REST API.
REST API requests Dataset Instances from the Dataset Management System.
Dataset Management System returns Dataset Instances to the REST API.
REST API shows Dataset Instances to the UI Application.
AppDeveloper selects a Dataset Instance and an operation through the UI Application.
UI Application posts the operation request to the REST API.
REST API requests the Dataset Management System to execute the operation on the selected Dataset Instance.
Dataset Management System performs the operation on the Dataset Instance.
The operation on the Dataset Instance is successful.
Dataset Management System confirms the success of the operation to the REST API.
REST API displays a success message to the UI Application.
UI Application displays the success message to the AppDeveloper.
